explains: vt. 诽谤；中伤；轻视；贬低

sentences.en: Two chose not to vilify Skilling, however.
sentences.cn: 然而，也有两个人并不愿诋毁思斯奇林。

sentences.en: You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them.
sentences.cn: 你可以引用他们，反对他们，质疑他们，颂扬或是诋毁他们。

sentences.en: The purpose of this article is not to scrutinize, vilify, or verify the so called Milk Diet.
sentences.cn: 本文的目的不是要审议，诋毁，或核实了所谓牛奶饮食。
